#{ebcuDistributePriority}, #{ebcuType} )

INSERT INTO eb_customer ( id, ebcu_quick_code, pm_code, ebcu_industry_type, ebcu_platform_nature, ebcu_name_cn, ebcu_short_name, ebcu_name_en, ebcu_tel, ebcu_fax, ebcu_url, ebcu_address, ebcu_finance_code, ebcu_tax_regist_no, ebcu_business_no, ebcu_ebfl_id, ebcu_customer_status, ebcu_registration_date, ebcu_max_guarantee_amount, ebcu_main_business, ebcu_is_subsupplier, ebcu_is_customer, ebcu_is_settlement, ebcu_remark, ebcu_esco_id, ebcu_substr1, ebcu_substr2, ebcu_substr3, ebcu_substr4, ebcu_substr5, ebcu_substr6, ebcu_subdate1, ebcu_subdate2, ebcu_subdate3, rec_ver, create_date, update_date, update_by, create_by, ebcu_cdh_code, ebcu_substr7, ebcu_substr8, ebcu_subdate4, ebcu_subdate5, ebcu_subnum1, ebcu_subnum2, ebcu_subnum3, ebcu_change_code, org_id, del_flag, ebcu_ebpl_country_code, ebcu_ebpl_province_code, ebcu_ebpl_city_code, ebcu_customer_no, ebcu_is_general_taxpayer, ebcu_zip_code, ebcu_tax_rate, ebcu_tax_rate_value, ebcu_order_amount_limit, ebcu_distribute_interval, ebcu_interval_capacity, ebcu_default_accept_time, ebcu_default_reject_time, ebcu_dispatch_issue_type, ebcu_distribute_priority, ebcu_type ) VALUES

mapper.update: UPDATE eb_customer SET ebcu_quick_code = #{ebcuQuickCode}, pm_code = #{pmCode}, ebcu_industry_type = #{ebcuIndustryType}, ebcu_platform_nature = #{ebcuPlatformNature}, ebcu_name_cn = #{ebcuNameCn}, ebcu_short_name = #{ebcuShortName}, ebcu_name_en = #{ebcuNameEn}, ebcu_tel = #{ebcuTel}, ebcu_fax = #{ebcuFax}, ebcu_url = #{ebcuUrl}, ebcu_address = #{ebcuAddress}, ebcu_finance_code = #{ebcuFinanceCode}, ebcu_tax_regist_no = #{ebcuTaxRegistNo}, ebcu_business_no = #{ebcuBusinessNo}, ebcu_ebfl_id = #{ebcuEbflId}, ebcu_customer_status = #{ebcuCustomerStatus}, ebcu_registration_date = #{ebcuIsCustomer}, ebcu_is_settlement = #{ebcuIsSettlement}, ebcu_remark = #{ebcuRemark}, ebcu_esco_id = #{ebcuEscoId}, ebcu_substr1 = #{ebcuSubstr1}, ebcu_substr2 = #{ebcuSubstr2}, ebcu_substr3 = #{ebcuSubstr3}, ebcu_substr4 = #{ebcuSubstr4}, ebcu_substr5 = #{ebcuSubstr5}, ebcu_substr6 = #{ebcuSubstr6}, ebcu_subdate1 = #{ebcuSubdate1}, ebcu_subdate2 = #{ebcuSubdate2}, ebcu_subdate3 = #{ebcuSubdate3}, rec_ver = #{recVer} + 1, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, ebcu_cdh_code = #{ebcuCdhCode}, ebcu_substr7 = #{ebcuSubstr7}, ebcu_substr8 = #{ebcuSubstr8}, ebcu_subdate4 = #{ebcuSubdate4}, ebcu_subdate5 = #{ebcuSubdate5}, ebcu_subnum1 = #{ebcuSubnum1}, ebcu_subnum2 = #{ebcuSubnum2}, ebcu_subnum3 = #{ebcuSubnum3}, ebcu_change_code = #{ebcuChangeCode}, ebcu_ebpl_country_code = #{ebcuEbplCountryCode}, ebcu_ebpl_province_code = #{ebcuEbplProvinceCode}, ebcu_ebpl_city_code = #{ebcuEbplCityCode}, ebcu_customer_no = #{ebcuCustomerNo}, ebcu_is_general_taxpayer = #{ebcuIsGeneralTaxpayer}, ebcu_zip_code = #{ebcuZipCode}, ebcu_tax_rate = #{ebcuTaxRate}, ebcu_tax_rate_value = #{ebcuTaxRateValue}, ebcu_order_amount_limit = #{ebcuOrderAmountLimit}, ebcu_distribute_interval = #{ebcuDistributeInterval}, ebcu_interval_capacity = #{ebcuIntervalCapacity}, ebcu_default_accept_time = #{ebcuDefaultAcceptTime}, ebcu_default_reject_time = #{ebcuDefaultRejectTime}, ebcu_dispatch_issue_type = #{ebcuDispatchIssueType}, ebcu_distribute_priority = #{ebcuDistributePriority}, ebcu_type = #{ebcuType} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM eb_customer WHERE ebcu_customer_no = #{customerNo} AND org_id = #{orgId}
